Article.Title: Notification obligation regarding rectification or erasure of personal data or restriction of processing

Obligation.Controller: The controller shall communicate any rectification or erasure of personal data or restriction of processing.

Recipients.Requirement: Each recipient to whom the personal data have been disclosed.
Recipients.Exceptions: Unless this proves impossible or involves disproportionate effort.

DataSubject.InformationRequirement: The controller shall inform the data subject about those recipients if the data subject requests it.
